item.title: JCI
item.description: score:13 Chances: Johnson Controls has reported strong revenue and EPS growth in Q3, which could indicate a positive outlook for the company. The acquisition of FM:Systems for $455 million shows the company’s commitment to expanding its digital buildings capabilities. Johnson Controls is the winner of the 2023 Microsoft Global Independent Software Vendor Partner of the Year, highlighting its industry recognition.
